info.name: Material SearX
info.description: A materialized SearX, for use with default theme.  The search bar at the top of results is disabled, because the idea is that you can just use the address bar (redundancy is gross).
info.additionalInfo:
* This style requests an icon font from gstatic.  If you don't like this, rehost the font on line 13.
* Remember to edit the domain for your own instance
